channel.title: Which one? (First Sig)
channel.description:
Ok well I just made these three sigs. They are basically allt he same except for the fact that like 1 doesn't have a boder, the other does, and the 3rd one has transparent zone. Please help me hear. I want to know which one looks best. Thanks :P
By the way, this is my first sig ever :P, so please be nice :o
1. [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingsig.jpg[/img]
2. [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingwborder.jpg[/img]
3. [IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingsigwtrans.gif[/img]
I put numbers before the sigs, so you just give me the number that is better, thnx :P.

item.title: Which one? (First Sig)
item.dc:creator: @Spikey_Hair Spikey Hair
item.description:
@Spikey_Hair wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:6, topic:172926”][quote author=Spikey Hair link=topic=233140.msg1993746#msg1993746 date=1200214892]

First sig, ten minutes, no tutorial? Unlikely.

So you have to doubt everything someone does, just because it is better than expected?.. Thanks alot… Didn’t know this place was full of jerks…
[/quote]
get used to it.[/quote]

Do you mean that in a nice way or a mean way?..

Read full topic
